meanings.definition: In a stingy or miserly manner.
meanings.sent1: She chintzily refused to share her snacks with anyone.
meanings.sent2: He counted his coins chintzily before deciding to buy a candy bar.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel chintzily hoarded all the acorns for itself.
meanings.sent4: The old man chintzily guarded his secret recipe for the best apple pie.
meanings.sent5: The landlord chintzily turned off the heating to save money in winter.

meanings.definition: Done in a cheap or shoddy way.
meanings.sent1: The chintzily made toy broke after just a few minutes of play.
meanings.sent2: She was disappointed with the chintzily sewn dress she bought on sale.
meanings.sent3: The chintzily painted fence started peeling after the first rain.
meanings.sent4: The chintzily constructed table collapsed under the weight of the dishes.
meanings.sent5: The chintzily designed website had a confusing layout and outdated graphics.
